title: New: Clubs – Bleed
body:
Leicester outfit **Clubs** have that HUGE sound going on.

You know, that sort of U2 meets Kings of Leon, with a dash of Foals, all topped off by a bit of WU LYF thrown in for good measure. Their debut track, _Bleed_, is one of the most ambitiously big tracks of the year so far. There’s no screwing around here, this is cards on the table, ‘we want to be playing stadiums’ indie, and it’s brilliant.

excerpt.full: Leicester outfit Clubs have that HUGE sound going on. You know, that sort of U2 meets Kings of Leon, with a dash of Foals, all topped off by a bit of WU LYF thrown in for good measure. Their debut track, Bleed, is one of the most ambitiously big tracks of the year so far. \[…\]
excerpt.short: Leicester outfit Clubs have that HUGE sound going on.
